name: School Food Maker Salon - Lunch Cooking & Cake Ice Cream Making Kids Games for Girls Boys
name_original: School Food Maker Salon - Lunch Cooking & Cake Ice Cream Making Kids Games for Girls Boys
description:
Can you make a delicious school lunch & dessert sweets for all of your friends?

Play a super fun Kids Cooking Game and start making delightful fluffy pancakes, yummy pizza pies, and sweetastic muffins!

Have fun playing an awesome Kids Cooking Game today!! Enjoy an exciting kids story and gameplay!

This is a fun casual game , kids game , girl's game , and boy's game
